# maximumConnectableDevices

**Type Property**

The maximum number of unique devices your app can connect to simultaneously.

## Declaration

```swift
static var maximumConnectableDevices: Int { get }
```

## Checking for the maximum devices and services

- **maximumPublishableServices**: The maximum number of unique services your app can publish simultaneously.
- **maximumSubscribableServices**: The maximum number of unique services your app can simultaneously subscribe to.
